bibl.title: Bulletin of Online Emendations to Papyri [BOEP]. Version 4.1 (December 3, 2014).
bibl.note: Emendations appearing in this bulletin have been entered online at www.papyri.info/editor/ via the Papyrological Editor (PE), and have been vetted by members of the PE's editorial board. The list contains corrections [by M.J. Albarrán, R. Ast, R. Bagnall, L. Berkes, A. Boud'hors, W.G. Claytor, H. Cuvigny, A. Delattre, T. Gagos, J. Gascou, N. Gonis, D. Hagedorn, P. Heilporn, J.G. Keenan, J.R. Rea, M. Sampson, J. Sosin, M. Stern & M. Zellmann-Rohrer] that were adopted between December 19, 2013 and December 3, 2014. These emendations have not appeared previously in print and are presented together for ease of reference and review.
bibl.seg: Rodney Ast & James Cowey (edd.), Bulletin of Online Emendations to Papyri [BOEP]. Version 4.1 (December 3, 2014).
Heidelberg, Ruprecht-Karls-Universität Heidelberg, Institut für Papyrologie, 2014, 5 pp.

Emendations appearing in this bulletin have been entered online at www.papyri.info/editor/ via the Papyrological Editor (PE), and have been vetted by members of the PE's editorial board. The list contains corrections [by M.J. Albarrán, R. Ast, R. Bagnall, L. Berkes, A. Boud'hors, W.G. Claytor, H. Cuvigny, A. Delattre, T. Gagos, J. Gascou, N. Gonis, D. Hagedorn, P. Heilporn, J.G. Keenan, J.R. Rea, M. Sampson, J. Sosin, M. Stern & M. Zellmann-Rohrer] that were adopted between December 19, 2013 and December 3, 2014. These emendations have not appeared previously in print and are presented together for ease of reference and review.
Ast Cowey Albarrán Bagnall Berkes Boud'hors Claytor Cuvigny Delattre Gagos Gascou Gonis Hagedorn Heilporn Keenan Rea Sampson Sosin Stern Zellmann-Rohrer
